description.english: Restore the Chronomancer Wheel with 1 gear while hosting or in singleplayer
description.german: Stellt das Rad des Chronomanten als Host oder im Einzelspielermodus mit 1 Zahnrad wieder her.
description.french: Restaurer la Roue du Chronomancien à l'aide de 1 rouage en hébergeant une partie ou en solo
description.koreana: 싱글플레이어 혹은 호스트한 게임에서 타륜에 기어 1개를 반환한다
description.spanish: Restaura la Rueda de cronomancia con 1 engranaje jugando como anfitrión o en Un jugador.
description.schinese: 主持多人游戏或单人游戏时，将1个齿轮装回时间巫师之轮
description.tchinese: 主持多人遊戲或單人遊戲時，將1個齒輪裝回時間巫師之輪
description.russian: Восстановите Колесо заклинателя времени с помощью одной шестерни, будучи организатором или в одиночной игре.
description.japanese: ホスト中またはシングルプレイヤー中に、歯車1個を使って時間術師の回転盤を修復する
description.brazilian: Restaure 1 engrenagem da Roda do Cronomante como anfitrião ou jogador único

displayName.japanese: アイザ・グラッドウェル

description.english: Defeat the Mechantress
description.german: Besiegt die Mechagierin.
description.french: Vaincre la Méchanteresse
description.spanish: Derrota a la Mecantadora.
description.schinese: 击败女魔法机工匠
description.tchinese: 擊敗女魔法機工匠
description.russian: Одолейте Мастерицу.
description.japanese: 女魔導機職人を倒す
description.brazilian: Derrote a Mecantadora

description.english: Defeat Orion
description.german: Besiegt Orion.
description.french: Vaincre Orion
description.spanish: Derrota a Orión.
description.schinese: 击败欧莱恩
description.tchinese: 擊敗歐萊恩
description.russian: Одолейте Ориона.
description.japanese: オリオンを倒す
description.brazilian: Derrote o Orion

description.english: Defeat Kolanna
description.german: Besiegt Kolanna.
description.french: Vaincre Kolanna
description.spanish: Derrota a Kolanna.
description.schinese: 击败科拉那
description.tchinese: 擊敗科拉那
description.russian: Одолейте Коланну.
description.japanese: コランナを倒す
description.brazilian: Derrote Kolanna

displayName.japanese: タリア・スターアイズ

description.english: Defeat the Blind Huntress
description.german: Bestiegt die blinde Jägerin.
description.french: Vaincre la Chasseresse aveugle
description.spanish: Derrota a la Cazadora ciega.
description.schinese: 击败盲眼女猎人
description.tchinese: 擊敗盲眼女獵人
description.russian: Одолейте Слепую охотницу.
description.japanese: 盲目の女狩人を倒す
description.brazilian: Derrote a Caçadora Cega

description.english: Defeat the Harbinger of Chaos
description.german: Besiegt den Vorboten des Chaos.
description.french: Vaincre le Héraut du Chaos
description.spanish: Derrota al Heraldo del caos.
description.schinese: 击败混沌信使
description.tchinese: 擊敗混沌信使
description.russian: Одолейте Предвестника хаоса.
description.japanese: カオスの前兆を倒す
description.brazilian: Derrote o Mensageiro do Caos

description.english: Kill or Charm a Construct Mechana
description.german: Tötet oder bezaubert ein Konstrukt-Mechana.
description.french: Tuer ou charmer un mechana de construction
description.spanish: Derrota o cautiva a una mecana constructora.
description.schinese: 击杀或魅惑一部建造魔法机
description.tchinese: 擊殺或魅惑一部建造魔法機
description.russian: Убейте или очаруйте механа-зодчего.
description.japanese: 魔導機ゴーレムを倒す、または魅了する
description.brazilian: Mate ou Encante uma Mecana de Construção

description.english: Kill or Charm a Fell Anarchist
description.german: Tötet oder bezaubert einen Bösland-Anarchisten.
description.french: Tuer ou charmer un anarchiste du Fell
description.spanish: Derrota o cautiva a un anarquista del Páramo.
description.schinese: 击杀或魅惑一名荒沼无政府分子
description.tchinese: 擊殺或魅惑一名荒沼無政府分子
description.russian: Убейте или очаруйте анархиста Топи.
description.japanese: フェルのアナーキストを倒す、または魅了する
description.brazilian: Mate ou Encante um Anarquista de Fel

description.english: Kill or Charm a Kingsguard
description.german: Tötet oder bezaubert ein Mitglied der Königsgarde.
description.french: Tuer ou charmer un garde royal
description.spanish: Derrota o cautiva a un guardia del rey.
description.schinese: 击杀或魅惑一名国王护卫
description.tchinese: 擊殺或魅惑一名國王護衛
description.russian: Убейте или очаруйте стража короля.
description.japanese: キングズガードを倒す、または魅了する
description.brazilian: Mate ou Encante um Guarda Real

displayName.english: The Hunter Is Now the Hunted

description.english: Kill or Charm a Mage Hunter
description.german: Tötet oder bezaubert einen Magierjäger.
description.french: Tuer ou charmer un chasseur de mages
description.spanish: Derrota o cautiva a un cazamagos.
description.schinese: 击杀或魅惑一名巫师猎人
description.tchinese: 擊殺或魅惑一名巫師獵人
description.russian: Убейте или очаруйте охотника на магов.
description.japanese: メイジハンターを倒す、または魅了する
description.brazilian: Mate ou Encante um Caça-magos

description.english: Shatter the ice on a frozen creature
description.german: Zerschlagt das Eis einer gefrorenen Kreatur.
description.french: Briser la glace d'une créature gelée
description.spanish: Fragmenta el hielo de una criatura congelada.
description.schinese: 破坏一个冻结生物身上的冰
description.tchinese: 破壞一個凍結生物身上的冰
description.russian: Разбейте лёд на замороженном существе.
description.japanese: 凍った生物の氷を砕く
description.brazilian: Destrua uma criatura congelada

description.english: Ignite a creature doused in oil with a fire bullet
description.german: Entzündet eine mit Öl überzogene Kreatur mit einer Feuerpatrone.
description.french: Enflammer une créature recouverte d'huile avec une balle de feu
description.koreana: 불 탄환으로 기름에 젖은 생명체에 불을 붙인다
description.spanish: Prende a una criatura empapada en aceite con una bala de fuego.
description.schinese: 用火焰子弹点燃一个沾了油的生物
description.tchinese: 用火焰子彈點燃一個沾了油的生物
description.russian: Подожгите облитое маслом существо огненной пулей.
description.japanese: 火炎弾でオイル状態の生物に火を付ける
description.brazilian: Incendeie uma criatura coberta de petróleo com uma bala de fogo

description.english: Electrocute a creature through water
description.german: Schockt eine Kreatur mit Wasser.
description.french: Électrocuter une créature avec de l'eau
description.spanish: Electrocuta a una criatura mediante agua.
description.schinese: 通过水源电击一个生物
description.tchinese: 透過水源電擊一個生物
description.russian: Ударьте существо током с помощью воды.
description.japanese: 水を介して生物を感電死させる
description.brazilian: Eletrocute uma criatura pela água

description.english: Slam a creature with force accumulated in stasis
description.german: Knallt mit der Kraft, die während der Stase gesammelt wurde, in eine Kreatur.
description.french: Frapper une créature avec la force accumulée pendant la stase
description.spanish: Golpea a una criatura con fuerza acumulada en estasis.
description.schinese: 用陷入静止状态时累积的推力重击一个生物
description.tchinese: 用陷入靜止狀態時累積的推力重擊一個生物
description.russian: Ударьте по существу силой, собранной в стазисе.
description.japanese: 静止状態の生物に衝撃を蓄積させて攻撃する
description.brazilian: Bata em uma criatura com força acumulada em estagnação

description.english: Heal a charmed creature
description.german: Heilt eine bezauberte Kreatur.
description.french: Soigner une créature charmée
description.spanish: Cura a una criatura cautivada.
description.schinese: 治疗一个受到魅惑的生物
description.tchinese: 治療一個受到魅惑的生物
description.russian: Исцелите очарованное существо.
description.japanese: 魅了された生物を回復する
description.brazilian: Cure uma criatura encantada

description.english: Use a poison finisher bullet on a poisoned creature
description.german: Verwendet eine Gift-Finisher-Patrone gegen eine vergiftete Kreatur.
description.french: Utiliser une balle toxique pour porter le coup fatal à une créature empoisonnée
description.spanish: Usa una bala rematadora de veneno sobre una criatura envenenada.
description.schinese: 对一个中毒的生物使用毒素终结子弹
description.tchinese: 對一個中毒的生物使用毒素終結子彈
description.russian: Добейте отравленное существо ядовитой пулей.
description.japanese: 毒に侵された生物にポイズンフィニッシャー弾を使用する
description.brazilian: Use uma bala com finalização de veneno em uma criatura envenenada

description.english: Craft Burning or Shocking Bullet Level 10 or higher
description.german: Stellt eine Brennende oder Schockende Patrone der Stufe 10 oder höher her.
description.french: Fabriquer des balles incendiaires ou électriques de niveau 10 ou plus
description.koreana: 레벨 10 이상의 충격, 혹은 불타는 탄환을 제작한다
description.spanish: Fabrica una bala ardiente o electrificante de nivel 10 o superior.
description.schinese: 制作等级10或以上的燃烧子弹或电击子弹
description.tchinese: 製作等級10或以上的燃燒子彈或電擊子彈
description.russian: Создайте горящую или электрическую пулю 10-го уровня или выше.
description.japanese: レベル10以上の燃焼弾または電撃弾をクラフトする
description.brazilian: Crie Balas de Fogo ou Choque de Nível 10 ou acima

displayName.french: Les flingues les plus rapides de l'ouest
displayName.spanish: Las armas más rápidas del oeste
displayName.brazilian: As Armas Mais Rápidas do Oeste

description.english: Craft an enchantment to reduce gun cooldowns on your gloves
description.german: Stellt eine Verzauberung für Eure Handschuhe her, die die Abklingzeit von Schusswaffen reduziert.
description.french: Fabriquer un enchantement sur vos gants pour réduire les temps de récupération des flingues
description.koreana: 마법 강화로 장갑의 총기 재사용 대기시간을 감소한다
description.spanish: Fabrica un encantamiento para reducir el tiempo de recuperación de armas de tus guantes.
description.schinese: 制作手套的物品咒语，缩短枪械冷却时间
description.tchinese: 製作手套的物品咒語，縮短槍械冷卻時間
description.russian: Создайте чары для перчаток, которые сократят перезарядку оружия.
description.japanese: 銃クールダウン減少のエンチャントをグローブに付与する
description.brazilian: Crie um encantamento para reduzir as recargas de arma nas suas luvas

displayName.french: Sac à dos, sac à dos !
displayName.japanese: バックパック、バックパック！

description.english: Craft the second or greater inventory expansion enchantment on your backpack
description.german: Stellt mindestens die zweite Erweiterungsverzauberung für Euren Rucksack her.
description.french: Fabriquer le deuxième (ou plus) enchantement d'extension d'inventaire pour votre sac
description.koreana: 배낭에 2차 이상 인벤토리 증가 강화를 부여한다
description.spanish: Fabrica el segundo encantamiento de expansión de inventario o superior en tu mochila.
description.schinese: 制作二级或以上的背包物品咒语，扩充物品栏
description.tchinese: 製作二級或以上的背包物品咒語，擴充物品欄
description.russian: Создайте чары расширения рюкзака второго уровня или выше.
description.japanese: バックパック拡張II以上のエンチャントをバックパックに付与する
description.brazilian: Crie o segundo ou maior encantamento de expansão de inventário na sua mochila

description.english: Craft an enchantment to dash further on your boots
description.german: Stellt die Verzauberung „Leerenwanderung“ für Eure Stiefel her.
description.french: Fabriquer l'enchantement de Marche du vide pour vos bottes
description.spanish: Fabrica el encantamiento Caminante del vacío en tus botas.
description.schinese: 制作靴子的“虚空漫步”物品咒语
description.tchinese: 製作靴子的「虛空漫步」物品咒語
description.russian: Создайте чары хождения по пустоте для ботинок.
description.japanese: 虚空渡りのエンチャントをブーツに付与する
description.brazilian: Crie o encantamento Passeio pelo Vácuo em suas botas

description.english: Craft the third or greater health regeneration enchantment on your amulet
description.german: Stellt mindestens die dritte Gesundheitsregenerations-Verzauberung für Euer Amulett her.
description.french: Fabriquer le troisième (ou plus) enchantement de régénération de santé pour votre amulette
description.koreana: 부적에 3차 이상의 체력 재생 강화를 부여한다
description.spanish: Fabrica el tercer encantamiento de regeneración de salud o superior en tu amuleto.
description.schinese: 制作三级或以上的护身符“生命值再生”物品咒语
description.tchinese: 製作三級或以上的護身符「生命值再生」物品咒語
description.russian: Создайте чары восстановления здоровья третьего уровня или выше для амулета.
description.japanese: HP再生III以上のエンチャントをアミュレットに付与する
description.brazilian: Crie o terceiro ou maior encantamento de recuperação de vida no seu amuleto

description.english: Craft the fifth or greater max health increase enchantment on your robes
description.german: Stellt mindestens die fünfte Verzauberung für Eure Roben her, die Eure max. Gesundheit erhöht.
description.french: Fabriquer le cinquième (ou plus) enchantement d'amélioration de santé pour votre robe
description.koreana: 로브에 5차 이상 최대 체력 강화를 부여한다
description.spanish: Fabrica el quinto encantamiento de aumento de salud máxima o superior en tu túnica.
description.schinese: 制作五级或以上的衣袍物品咒语，增加生命值上限
description.tchinese: 製作五級或以上的衣袍物品咒語，增加生命值上限
description.russian: Создайте чары повышения макс. здоровья пятого уровня или выше для своих одеяний.
description.japanese: 最大HP増加V以上のエンチャントをローブに付与する
description.brazilian: Crie o quinto ou maior encantamento de aumento de vida máxima nas suas túnicas

description.english: Survive until Day 5 while averting the apocalypse
description.german: Überlebt bis Tag 5 und verhindert bis dahin die Apokalypse.
description.french: Survivre jusqu'au jour 5 en combattant l'apocalypse
description.spanish: Sobrevive hasta el Día 5 mientras evitas el apocalipsis.
description.schinese: 设法阻止末日的同时活到第5天
description.tchinese: 設法阻止末日的同時活到第5天
description.russian: Продержитесь до пятого дня, предотвращая апокалипсис.
description.japanese: 世界の終末を回避してDay 5まで生き残る
description.brazilian: Sobreviva até o Dia 5 enquanto desvia do apocalipse

description.english: Survive in the apocalypse for 5 minutes
description.german: Überlebt 5 Minuten lang in der Apokalypse.
description.french: Survivre 5 minutes pendant l'apocalypse
description.spanish: Sobrevive en el apocalipsis durante 5 minutos.
description.schinese: 在末日之中存活5分钟
description.tchinese: 在末日之中存活5分鐘
description.russian: Продержитесь пять минут в апокалипсисе.
description.japanese: 世界の終末を5分間生き残る
description.brazilian: Sobreviva no apocalipse por 5 minutos

displayName.japanese: 指名手配 生死問わず
displayName.brazilian: Procura-se Sem Vida ou Com Vida

description.tchinese: 交出戰利品

displayName.french: Rien qu'un pauvre chasseur de primes
displayName.brazilian: Só um Humilde Caçador de Recompensas

displayName.spanish: Ponla en el muelle de carga
displayName.japanese: こいつを貨物室へ運び込め

description.german: Erhaltet ein goldenes Kopfgeld.

description.german: Stellt ein Kopfgeld-Mechana her.
description.french: Construire un mechana des primes
description.spanish: Construye una mecana de recompensas.

description.tchinese: 建造一部懸賞魔法機

description.german: Erlebt ein Überraschungsereignis.

description.tchinese: 碰到意外事件

description.brazilian: Encontre um evento surpresa

displayName.russian: Соберите книжные полки Магуса, алхимика, колдуна и чернокнижника

description.english: Construct the Magus, Alchemist, Sorcerer, and Warlock bookshelves
description.german: Baut die Bücherregale des Magus, Alchemisten, Hexenmeisters und Zaubermeisters.
description.french: Construire les bibliothèques de mage, d'alchimiste, de sorcier et d'ensorceleur

description.tchinese: 建造魔法師、煉金術士、法師、咒術士的書櫃

description.english: Defeat all bosses on Sheriff difficulty or greater
description.german: Besiegt alle Bosse auf dem Schwierigkeitsgrad „Sheriff“ oder höher.
description.french: Vaincre tous les boss en difficulté Shérif ou plus

description.schinese: 以警长难度或更高难度击败所有头目
description.tchinese: 以警長難度或更高難度擊敗所有頭目
description.russian: Одолейте всех боссов на уровне сложности «Шериф» или выше

description.german: Besiegt alle Bosse auf dem Schwierigkeitsgrad „Outlaw“ oder höher.
description.french: Vaincre tous les boss en difficulté Hors-la-loi

description.tchinese: 以不法之徒難度或更高難度擊敗所有頭目

description.english: Defeat Chaos, the Exiled God
description.german: Besiegt Chaos, den verbannten Gott.
description.french: Vaincre Chaos, le dieu exilé
description.spanish: Derrota a Caos, el Dios exiliado.
description.schinese: 击败被逐之神混沌
description.tchinese: 擊敗被逐之神混沌

description.english: Defeat Chaos, the Exiled God with the assistance of the Riders
description.german: Besiegt Chaos, den verbannten Gott, mit der Unterstützung der Reiter.
description.french: Vaincre Chaos, le dieu exilé avec l'aide des Cavaliers
description.koreana: 기수들의 도움과 함께 추방된 신, 혼돈을 쓰러뜨린다
description.spanish: Derrota a Caos, el Dios exiliado con la ayuda de los Jinetes.
description.schinese: 与骑士联手击败被逐之神混沌
description.tchinese: 與騎士聯手擊敗被逐之神混沌
description.russian: Одолейте Хаос, Изгнанного Бога, вместе со Всадниками

description.brazilian: Derrote Caos, o Deus Exilado, com a ajuda dos Cavaleiros
